Material used.Description: This study investigated the role of the EIF2AK4 gene variant in patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunoblot analysis revealed a significant reduction in protein expression (approximately 60% of control) in fibroblasts carrying the c.1234A>G variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Basic positive control.Description: A control plasmid expressing wild-type EIF2AK4 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression between 80% and 120% of the control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 80% or greater than 120% of the control.
